text: A very popular series in Japan, we only got a couple games from it here in North America because of licensing problems. You have robots from the Gundam universe, Evangelion, Macross, etc. I haven't finished any of them, but the gameplay is fun. It's a strategyï»¿ RPG which has some similarities to Fire Emblem. This track has the pure SNES boss battle sound to it.
